name: Big Berry Pendant
description:
This juicy lampwork pendant looks fresh picked.  It is over an inch long and comes on a 24- inch gunmetal chain.

All my beads are made on a torch in my Hillsborough studio and carefully annealed in a kiln for lasting enjoyment.

name: Pumpkin Acorn Pendant
description:
This shimmery little acorn will carry you through fall.  It comes with a filagree accent leaf and 30-inch chain all in a gunmetal finish.

All my beads are made on a minor bench burner of 90 or 104 coe glass and carefully annealed in a kiln to ensure years of enjoyment.

name: Chocolate Marble Heart Pendant
description:
I can never decide if I like milk chocolate or white chocolate best so I marbled them together in this yummy heart pendant.  There is even a ivory rose with dark chocolate stem to top it all off.  

All made lampwork beads are crafted on a torch in my Hillsborough studio and carefully annealed in a kiln to ensure years of enjoyment.

The pendant has sterling components and comes with an 18-inch rubber cord with sterling lobster class.   It will arrive in a gift box ready for you or a special someone.

Please contact me if you wish to see other pictures.

name: Valentine Poppy Bitty Bloom Pendant
description:
This unique pendant is a small version of my signature glass jewelry.  It is a hybrid of fused and lampwork glass techniques with a smooth finish like beach glass.  

The pendant has a silverplated bail and comes with an adjustable 18-inch leather cord. 

Please contact me if you wish to see other pictures.

name: Very Berry Earrings
description:
These bright, juicy berries look like they were just picked from my yard. The components are all sterling silver so they are nickel-free.

All lampwork beads are handcrafted of 90 or 104 COE glass on my oxy-propane torch and properly annealed in a kiln to ensure years of pleasure.
